channel.title: Posts on Shahzeb97
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Shahzeb97

item.title: My Article in Pumps & Systems Magazine
item.description: Check out this article I wrote on motors! Huge thanks to the Conifer team especially Stella Hur for the opportunity.

item.title: Introducing Cypress
item.description: A novel 1.5 HP, 3600 RPM NEMA 56 EC Motor, and my first product release with Conifer!

item.title: ASME Y14.5 Certified!
item.description: Me getting a few certifications in engineering drawing and GD&T through ASME

item.title: Published in IJHMT + My Thesis
item.description: Getting my first journal publication in International Journal of Heat and Mass Transfer (IJHMT). Finally.

item.title: Many Updates!
item.description: A quick update on life and work since my last post!

item.title: Taking my Research to Conferences
item.description: Taking my master's research findings to ITherm 2023 in Orlando and IHTC 2023 in Cape Town - a world tour of conferences!

item.title: Gear Toy
item.description: A procedurally generated gear fidget toy made with the Godot game engine - hand-coded mesh generation with GDScript!

item.title: The Last Dodo
item.description: My first ever game jam entry - a game about the last dodo bird trying to escape extinction, made with the Godot Engine in 24 hours!

item.title: no name¬Æ Todo List App
item.description: A minimalist Flutter todo list app inspired by the no name¬Æ brand's clean aesthetic - my CS50x final project!

item.title: Presenting at the 1st CPE Research Day
item.description: Presenting my 3-minute research outline at the inaugural CPE Research Day 2022 - A Project Showcase and Student Awards Event at the University of Toronto.

item.title: Awarded the $15K Queen Elizabeth II Graduate Scholarship
item.description: Awarded the Queen Elizabeth II Graduate Scholarship in Science and Technology (QEII-GSST) for 2022-2023 for research in thermal management strategies for electric vehicles.

item.title: Awarded the $15K Climate Positive Energy Graduate Scholarship
item.description: Selected as part of the first cohort of UofT's Climate Positive Energy Initiative to research thermal management of EV power electronics using metallic phase change materials.

item.title: Wikipedia Network Graph
item.description: A Wikipedia network visualization tool that creates beautiful graphs showing relationships between articles - gluing Python libraries together for fun!

item.title: Fluid Simulation from Scratch
item.description: A 2-D fluid simulation solver I made for a class in grad school üë®‚Äçüéì. Built from scratch in Python using the SIMPLE algorithm, with flexible mask-based obstacles!

item.title: Meltdown Imminent
item.description: My research proposal on using metallic phase change materials (MPCMs) to enable faster EV charging by managing heat in power electronics.
